markdownRemark.html: Uh-oh! I'm getting this error when trying to use the php memcached extension to manage sessions, specifying the memcache server with a host name rather than an ip address. Interesting. I have hostname lookups off in my apache configuration, perhaps that it affecting it.

frontmatter.title: PHP Warning Unknown php network getaddresses getaddrinfo failed Name or service not known in Unknown on line 0
